name: Myth II: Soulblighter
description: Original CD version. NB: Install patch 1.8 afterwards, it's required.

files.file1: N/A:Select Myth II's Autoplay.exe or Setup.exe (in the setup folder on the CD-rom).

content:
files:
- file1: N/A:Select Myth II's Autoplay.exe or Setup.exe (in the setup folder on the
    CD-rom).
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Myth II/Myth II.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    executable: file1
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
